name: Peanut Soba Noodle Salad
author: Mishka, @mishkamakesfood
ingredients: veg mix 1: 1/2 small red cabbage, finely sliced
veg mix 1: 2 carrots, sliced into long matchsticks
veg mix 1: 1 cucumber, sliced into long matchsticks
veg mix 1: 500g frozen edamame, cooked and drained
veg mix 1: 1 red bell pepper, sliced, optional
veg mix 2: 100g sugar snaps, sliced thinly across
Extra lime wedges to serve, optional
method: Cook noodles according to package instructions. Combine with vegetables from mix 1 or 2 (recommend not mixing but you do you).
Stir together peanut butter, soy sauce, honey, sriracha, garlic, vinegar, ginger if using, and lime juice to make the sauce. Use water to thin as necessary (think typical dressing thickness).
Toss together veggie-noodle mixture with sauce. Keep for up to 5 days in an air-tight container.
